title: p4ngp4ng
author: p4ngp4ng
created_time: December 07, 2022, 01:00:24 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 01:12:44 PM by p4ngp4ng
content: No pre-mine. No crowd-sale. A real community-run. And begin with block height 0#.PoW, ethash-algo.yes, tokens, dApps, DAOs, ICO, DeFi, NFTs... exactly alike, because we can copy its code.okay, probably short of ethic, but they cheat us first, don't they?now, what do you think?

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: p4ngp4ng on December 07, 2022, 01:00:24 PMNo pre-mine. No crowd-sale. A real community-run. And begin with block height 0#.PoW, ethash-algo.yes, tokens, dApps, DAOs, ICO, DeFi, NFTs... exactly alike, because we can copy its code.okay, probably short of ethic, but they cheat us first, don't they?now, what do you think?Ethereum on the proof of stake protocol has a low transaction speed, no more than 40 transactions per second. Modern blockchains have a real TPS of several thousand transactions, while modern competitors announce TPS of several hundred thousand transactions. This is not the best development path for a new project in today's world.
